PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02382013-03-07,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of STEPHEN B. SIMPSON of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designate of STEPHEN B. SIMPSON for the British Columbia/Yukon region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of the Act; and determine that STEPHEN B. SIMPSON shall reside within 100 kilometres of the British Columbia/Yukon regional Office, effective June 23, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
